path



C_PATH_LEN

#define C_PATH_LEN 512
type: C preprocessor definition

Path

typedef char Path[C_PATH_LEN];
type: C typedef
description: path is 512 len

c_path_get_name

bstr c_path_get_name(const Path path);
type: C function
description: get path name

c_path_get_extension

bstr c_path_get_extension(const Path path);
type: C function
description: get path extension

c_path_get_shortname

bstr c_path_get_shortname(const Path path);
type: C function
description: get path shortname (no extension)

c_path_get_directory

bstr c_path_get_directory(const Path path);
type: C function
description: get path directory

c_path_get_root

bstr c_path_get_root(const Path path);
type: C function
description: get path root

c_path_get

bstr c_path_get(const Path path, uint index);
type: C function
description: get path element

c_path_count

uint c_path_count(const Path path);
type: C function
description: count path levels

c_path_reset

void c_path_reset(Path path);
type: C function
description: reset path

c_path_append_string

void c_path_append_string(Path path, const char *value);
type: C function
description: append string to path

c_path_append_bstr

void c_path_append_bstr(Path path, const bstr text);
type: C function
description: append string block to path

c_path_remove_last

void c_path_remove_last(Path path);
type: C function
description: remove last element of path

c_path_set

void c_path_set(Path path, const char *text);
type: C function
description: set path from string

c_path_set_bstr

void c_path_set_bstr(Path path, const bstr text);
type: C function
description: set path from string block

c_path_format

void c_path_format(Path path, const char* format, ...);
type: C function
description: format path

c_path_format_list

void c_path_format_list(Path path, const char* format, va_list args);
type: C function
description: format path - list version

c_path_sanitize

bool c_path_sanitize(Path path);
type: C function
description: sanitize path, if invalid value will become INVALID-PATH
